enhanced_description: HReasily, part of the HR Innovations Group, is a leading cloud-based HR-Tech company in Asia, serving over 68,000 businesses across multiple countries, including Thailand, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Indonesia, and Cambodia. It offers a comprehensive, one-stop HR software suite designed to automate HR processes anytime, anywhere. This suite includes core HR functions such as full-service payroll, leave management, claims processing, time & attendance, and employee onboarding solutions. Key features include facial recognition for time tracking, a mobile app for on-the-go access, and a self-service platform enabling employees to apply for and approve leaves, submit claims, receive payslips, and clock in/out. HReasily aims to provide seamless integration with existing software and hardware for efficient business operations.
